data.title: Welcome Valdosta State University Students
data.meta_description: For an affordable, accessible, AACSB-accredited graduate degree, select a nationally-ranked program in the J. Whitney Bunting College of Business and Technology.
data.text:
The J. Whitney Bunting College of Business and Technology is thrilled to offer students in business related programs at Valdosta State University an affordable, accessible, AACSB-accredited graduate degree. You can select a nationally-ranked program in the J. Whitney Bunting College of Business and Technology and join a community of students and professionals choosing online programs in logistics, information systems, or an MBA as well as a face-to-face Master of Accountancy.

Apply Now

Valdosta State students can receive 15% off of their application using the code BLAZERS15
